# Solutioning a Data pipeline for visualization  
  
Akanxa Padhi  
  
As a part of my community contribution, I present a lightning talk on some of the key considerations to keep in mind while designing a data pipeline for an organization. I use a scenario from my workplace to share my experience.  

Please refer to my slides here - https://github.com/akp21/EDAV_CC20/blob/main/Datapipeline_solution.pptx
